00030 #define LDBG__ BOOST_LOG_USE_LOG_IF_FILTER(g_log_dbg(), g_dbg_filter()->is_enabled() ) << DBG_TAG
00031 #define LERR__ BOOST_LOG_USE_LOG_IF_FILTER(g_log_err(), g_err_filter()->is_enabled() ) << ERR_TAG
00032 #define LAPP__ BOOST_LOG_USE_LOG_IF_FILTER(g_log_app(), g_app_filter()->is_enabled() ) << APP_TAG
00033 #define VACANCY_ BOOST_LOG_USE_LOG_IF_FILTER(vacancy_log(), g_block()->is_enabled() )

00053   }
00054   
00055   virtual log& operator << (const char* in){return *this;}
00056   virtual log& operator << (const std::string in){return *this;}
00057   virtual log& operator << (int in){return *this;}
00058   virtual log& operator << (double in){return *this;}
00059   virtual log& operator << (long double in){return *this;}
00060   virtual log& operator << (unsigned long in){return *this;}
00061   virtual log& operator << (float in){return *this;}

00063   virtual log& operator << (unsigned short in){return *this;}
00064   virtual log& operator << (short in){return *this;}

00071 class no_log:public log
00072 {
00073 
00074  BOOST_DEFINE_LOG_FILTER(g_block, filter::no_ts )
00075    BOOST_DEFINE_LOG(vacancy_log, logger_type)
00076    public:
00077   no_log()
00078   {
00079     g_block()->set_enabled(false);
00080   }
00081 
00082 
00083   virtual ~no_log()
00084   {
00085   }
00086   
00087   virtual no_log& operator << (const char* in){VACANCY_<<in;return *this;}
00088   virtual no_log& operator << (const std::string in){VACANCY_<<in.c_str();return *this;}
00089   virtual no_log& operator << (int in){VACANCY_<<in;return *this;}
00090   virtual no_log& operator << (double in){VACANCY_<<in;return *this;}
00091   virtual no_log& operator << (long double in){VACANCY_<<in;return *this;}
00092   virtual no_log& operator << (unsigned long in){VACANCY_<<in;return *this;}
00093   virtual no_log& operator << (float in){VACANCY_<<in;return *this;}
00094   virtual no_log& operator << (char in){VACANCY_<<in;return *this;}
00095   virtual no_log& operator << (unsigned short in){VACANCY_<<in;return *this;}
00096   virtual no_log& operator << (short in){VACANCY_<<in;return *this;}
00097   virtual no_log& operator << (unsigned int in){VACANCY_<<in;return *this;}
00098   virtual no_log& operator << (bool in){VACANCY_<<in;return *this;}  
00099 };

00101 class dbg_log
00102   :public log
00103 {
00104 
00105  BOOST_DEFINE_LOG_FILTER(g_dbg_filter, filter::no_ts )
00106    BOOST_DEFINE_LOG(g_log_dbg, logger_type)
00107       
00108    public:
00109   dbg_log()
00110   {
00111       
00112     // Debug log
00113     g_log_dbg()->writer().add_formatter( formatter::time("$hh:$mm.$ss ") );
00114     g_log_dbg()->writer().add_formatter( formatter::append_newline() );
00115     //g_log_dbg()->writer().add_destination( destination::dbg_window() );
00116     g_log_dbg()->writer().add_destination( destination::file(DBG_LOG_NAME) );
00117 #ifdef DBG2CONSOLE // put debug info into console
00118     g_log_dbg()->writer().add_destination( destination::cout() );
00119 #endif
00120 
00121     g_log_dbg()->mark_as_initialized();
00122     
00123 #ifndef DBG_DISABLE //disable the debug info
00124     g_dbg_filter()->set_enabled(true);
00125 #else
00126     g_dbg_filter()->set_enabled(false);
00127 #endif
00128 
00129   }
00130 
00131   virtual ~dbg_log()
00132   {
00133   }
00134   
00135   virtual dbg_log& operator << (const char* in){LDBG__<<in;return *this;}
00136   virtual dbg_log& operator << (const std::string in){LDBG__<<in.c_str();return *this;}
00137   virtual dbg_log& operator << (int in){LDBG__<<in;return *this;}
00138   virtual dbg_log& operator << (double in){LDBG__<<in;return *this;}
00139   virtual dbg_log& operator << (long double in){LDBG__<<in;return *this;}
00140   virtual dbg_log& operator << (unsigned long in){LDBG__<<in;return *this;}
00141   virtual dbg_log& operator << (float in){LDBG__<<in;return *this;}
00142   virtual dbg_log& operator << (char in){LDBG__<<in;return *this;}
00143   virtual dbg_log& operator << (unsigned short in){LDBG__<<in;return *this;}
00144   virtual dbg_log& operator << (short in){LDBG__<<in;return *this;}
00145   virtual dbg_log& operator << (unsigned int in){LDBG__<<in;return *this;}
00146   virtual dbg_log& operator << (bool in){LDBG__<<in;return *this;}
00147     
00148 };

00150 class app_log :public log
00151 {
00152  BOOST_DEFINE_LOG_FILTER(g_app_filter, filter::no_ts )
00153    BOOST_DEFINE_LOG(g_log_app, logger_type)
00154    public:
00155   app_log()
00156   {
00157       
00158     // App log
00159     g_log_app()->writer().add_formatter( formatter::time("$hh:$mm.$ss ") );
00160     g_log_app()->writer().add_formatter( formatter::append_newline() );
00161     g_log_app()->writer().add_destination( destination::file(APP_LOG_NAME) );
00162 #ifdef APP2CONSOLE // put application info to console
00163     g_log_app()->writer().add_destination( destination::cout() );
00164 #endif
00165     g_log_app()->mark_as_initialized();
00166     
00167 #ifndef APP_DISABLE // disable the app info
00168     g_app_filter()->set_enabled(true);
00169 #else
00170     g_app_filter()->set_enabled(false);
00171 #endif
00172 
00173   }
00174 
00175   virtual ~app_log()
00176   {
00177   }
00178   
00179   virtual app_log& operator << (const char* in){LAPP__<<in;return *this;}
00180   virtual app_log& operator << (const std::string in){LAPP__<<in.c_str();return *this;}
00181   virtual app_log& operator << (int in){LAPP__<<in;return *this;}
00182   virtual app_log& operator << (double in){LAPP__<<in;return *this;}
00183   virtual app_log& operator << (long double in){LAPP__<<in;return *this;}
00184   virtual app_log& operator << (unsigned long in){LAPP__<<in;return *this;}
00185   virtual app_log& operator << (float in){LAPP__<<in;return *this;}
00186   virtual app_log& operator << (char in){LAPP__<<in;return *this;}
00187   virtual app_log& operator << (unsigned short in){LAPP__<<in;return *this;}
00188   virtual app_log& operator << (short in){LAPP__<<in;return *this;}
00189   virtual app_log& operator << (unsigned int in){LAPP__<<in;return *this;}
00190   virtual app_log& operator << (bool in){LAPP__<<in;return *this;}

00192 };

00194 class err_log:public log
00195 {
00196  BOOST_DEFINE_LOG_FILTER(g_err_filter, filter::no_ts )
00197    BOOST_DEFINE_LOG(g_log_err, logger_type)
00198    public:
00199   err_log()
00200   {
00201       
00202     // Err log
00203     g_log_err()->writer().add_formatter( formatter::idx(), "[%] "  );
00204     g_log_err()->writer().add_formatter( formatter::time("$hh:$mm.$ss ") );
00205     g_log_err()->writer().add_formatter( formatter::append_newline() );
00206     g_log_err()->writer().add_destination( destination::file(ERR_LOG_NAME) );
00207 
00208 #ifdef ERR2CONSOLE// put error info into the console
00209     g_log_err()->writer().add_destination( destination::cout() );
00210 #endif
00211 
00212     g_log_err()->mark_as_initialized();
00213     
00214 #ifndef ERR_DISABLE // disable the error info
00215     g_err_filter()->set_enabled(true);
00216 #else
00217     g_err_filter()->set_enabled(false);
00218 #endif
00219 
00220   }
00221 
00222 
00223   virtual ~err_log()
00224   {
00225   }
00226   
00227   virtual err_log& operator << (const char* in){LERR__<<in;return *this;}
00228   virtual err_log& operator << (const std::string in){LERR__<<in.c_str();return *this;}
00229   virtual err_log& operator << (int in){LERR__<<in;return *this;}
00230   virtual err_log& operator << (double in){LERR__<<in;return *this;}
00231   virtual err_log& operator << (long double in){LERR__<<in;return *this;}
00232   virtual err_log& operator << (unsigned long in){LERR__<<in;return *this;}
00233   virtual err_log& operator << (float in){LERR__<<in;return *this;}
00234   virtual err_log& operator << (char in){LERR__<<in;return *this;}
00235   virtual err_log& operator << (unsigned short in){LERR__<<in;return *this;}
00236   virtual err_log& operator << (short in){LERR__<<in;return *this;}
00237   virtual err_log& operator << (unsigned int in){LERR__<<in;return *this;}
00238   virtual err_log& operator << (bool in){LERR__<<in;return *this;}
00239   
00240 };

00242 extern dbg_log dbg;
00243 extern no_log nlog;
00244 extern app_log app;
00245 extern err_log err;
00246 
00247 class if_log
00248 {
00249  public:
00250   static log& if_dlog(int f)
00251   {
00252     if (f)
00253       return dbg;
00254 
00255     return nlog;
00256   }
00257 
00258   static log& if_elog(int f)
00259   {
00260     if (f)
00261       return err;
00262 
00263     return nlog;
00264   
00265   }
00266 
00267   static log& if_alog(int f)
00268   {
00269     if (f)
00270       return app;
00271 
00272     return nlog;
00273   }
00274 }
00275 ;

00277 #define IF_DLOG(F) if_log::if_dlog(F)
00278   
00279 #define IF_ELOG(F) if_log::if_elog(F)
00280 #define IF_ALOG(F) if_log::if_alog(F)
